channel.title: Innocent Musings of an Amateur Mind
channel.description: Innocent Musings of an Amateur Mind

item.title: An Amateur Mind
item.description:
An Amateur Mind

My life has been a continually rolling series of failures, fuck ups, and hospital beds. This definitely isn’t an instruction guide for happiness nor success, rather a somewhat shitty recounting of how I survived some of it and fucked up the rest.

item.title: Summa Omnium Veritatum…
item.description:
Summa Omnium Veritatum…

It was early on in my life that I learned lessons that, now I realize, take most humans a lifetime to learn; if ever. First lesson, pain is truth; most have never experienced the kind of life changing pain I’m referring to which is why I think sometimes it’s hard for me to relate to other hominids. This type of pain changes your perception of reality; for myself, it seemed I could just make out the edges of the curtain on reality; as if peeling it back would reveal the wizard pulling the levers behind it. If reality was this tenuous projection upon a thin veil, that everyone around me seemed blind to, then I was going to make it my own; king be the one-eyed man in the land of the blind.

item.title: Live or Die on this day…
item.description:
Live or Die on this day…

I got eight months of normalcy, or at least as normal as I could get. In those eight months my friendship with Francisco blossomed into what it is today, a brotherly bond. Then it started…

item.title: It is the privilege of lesser men to light the flame…
item.description:
It is the privilege of lesser men to light the flame…

Growing up apart from society, confined within hospital walls, gave me an exception to what I consider its monopoly on conformity. I had to learn quickly and adapt. I spent my childhood learning this lesson. A lesson I thought I was done learning; and like most other times in life, upon self reflection, I realize how wrong I was.

item.title: Intelligent life?
item.description:
Intelligent life?

I was born on August 1983 in Tegucigalpa, Honduras…
